Tartarus

Close call

22 Jan 2018

Well I really nearly forgot to write today... fortunately it turns out not being able to sleep has some advantages and I remembered just in time. It probably shows how cluttered my brain is that I didn’t think about this all day :-(. Tomorrow I will have to try and set up some kind of alarm again.
